axis_angle_rotation[source]

axis_angle_rotation(axis:str, angle, mode='normal')

Return the rotation matrices for one of the rotations about an axis of which Euler angles describe, for each value of the angle given.

Args: axis: Axis label "X" or "Y or "Z". angle: any shape tensor of Euler angles in radians

Returns: Rotation matrices as tensor of shape (..., 3, 3).

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

rotate[source]

rotate(vertices, angles)

rotate vertices. X_new = R.dot(X). X: 3 x 1 Args: vertices: [nver, 3]. rx, ry, rz: degree angles rx: pitch. positive for looking down ry: yaw. positive for looking left rz: roll. positive for tilting head right Returns: rotated vertices: [nver, 3]

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

matrix2angle[source]

matrix2angle(R)

get three Euler angles from Rotation Matrix Args: R: (3,3). rotation matrix Returns: x: pitch y: yaw z: roll

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
